# 1998 Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation

The 1998 Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation () was held in January 1999. It is part of the Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation series held in Hong Kong.
Top 10 song awards
The top 10 songs (十大勁歌金曲) of 1998 are as follows.
